skin.content:
<style>
  #f5Topbar i { color: {{param.topbar.menuIconColor}}; }
  #toolbarMail:hover i { color: {{param.topbar.mailIcon.hover}}; }
  #toolbarSearch:hover i { color: {{param.topbar.searchIcon.hover}}; }
  #toolbarCustomize:hover i { color: {{param.topbar.customizeIcon.hover}}; }
</style>
